title: How to Create a Very Simple Program in Python

steps.title: Open up a new window in python shell by pressing ctrl-N or going to 'File' and 'New window'.
steps.content: Open up a new window in python shell by pressing ctrl-N or going to 'File' and 'New window'.

steps.title: Start with an introductory sentence.
steps.content: Start with an introductory sentence. So you have to use the print function. Type below codes: print ( "Let's see how long you have lived in days, minutes and seconds." )

steps.title: Ask the user's name.
steps.content: Ask the user's name. It's nice to know what the user's name is, so type this in line 2: name = input ( "name: " ) The variable "name" has now been replaced by the user's input.

steps.title: Ask their age.
steps.content: Ask their age. You need to know the age, now you do the same thing as above except you have to use the "int" function, because the user will enter a number, like this: print ( "now enter your age" ) age = int ( input ( "age: " )) The variable "age" has now been replaced by the user's input.

steps.title: Do the conversions using the user's given age.
steps.content: Do the conversions using the user's given age. days = age * 365 minutes = age * 525948 seconds = age * 31556926 Once you have written this, Python automatically changes the values for days, minutes, and seconds, based on the user's input of age.

steps.title: Display to the user his/her information.
steps.content: Display to the user his/her information. print ( name , "has been alive for" , days , "days" , minutes , "minutes and" , seconds , "seconds! Wow!" )

steps.title: Congrats!
steps.content: Congrats! you made a real program that serves a purpose! Save it and run it by going to 'run' and 'run module'. Try it out for yourself!
